uz.welcome_message: Salom!  Botimizga xush kelibsiz! ğŸ‰ Siz o'ziga xos, qiziqarli va esda qolarli niklar yaratmoqchimisiz? Endi bu juda oson! ğŸ’« Shunchaki ism kiriting va biz sizga eng zo'r variantlarni taqdim etamiz. ğŸš€

ğŸ’¡ Botdan unumli foydalaning va o'z uslubingizni yarating! 
 1ï¸âƒ£ Qisqa nik yaratish: Botdan qisqa va chiroyli niklar olish uchun ismingizni kiriting â€“ bot sizga noyob variantlarni taklif qiladi. 
 2ï¸âƒ£ Qo'llanma bilan tanishing: Botdan to'g'ri foydalanishni o'rganish uchun 'ğŸ“™ Qo'llanma' tugmasini bosing va barcha funksiyalar haqida batafsil ma'lumot oling. 
 3ï¸âƒ£ Top niklar to'plami: Eng chiroyli va mashhur niklar ro'yxatini ko'ring, o'ziga xos uslubingizni toping!

uz.about: Nik generatsiyasi: Foydalanuvchi ism kiritganda, bot bir nechta turli xil nik variantlarini yaratadi va ularni sahifalarga boâ€˜lib koâ€˜rsatadi. Har bir sahifada 10 ta nik koâ€˜rsatiladi va foydalanuvchi â€œOrqagaâ€ yoki â€œOldingaâ€ tugmalari yordamida sahifalarni oâ€˜zaro oâ€˜zgartirishi mumkin.

us.welcome_message: Hello!  Do you want to create unique, interesting, and memorable nicknames? Now it's super easy! ğŸ’« Just enter your name, and weâ€™ll provide you with the best options. ğŸš€
us.help: Need help? We help you create unique, custom, and original nicknames! ğŸ”¥ Generate as many nicknames as you want, choose, and create a style that's totally yours! ğŸ˜
us.guide:
ğŸ’¡ Make the most out of the bot and create your style! 
 1ï¸âƒ£ Create short nicknames: Enter your name to get short and creative nicknames from the bot. 
 2ï¸âƒ£ Explore the guide: Press 'ğŸ“™ Guide' for detailed instructions on how to use the bot. 
 3ï¸âƒ£ Top nick collection: See the list of most stylish and popular nicknames, and find your unique style
4ï¸âƒ£Change the language
us.admin_1_t: Send a message to the admin:
us.about: Nickname Generation: When a user enters their name, the bot generates several different nickname options and displays them divided into pages. Each page shows 10 nicknames, and the user can navigate between pages using the â€œBackâ€ or â€œNextâ€ buttons.
